column1:
White Birth, is this UK slang?


I'm watching an episode of BroadChurch and one person didn't want to talk to her ex's girlfriend and was described as giving her a "white Birth", if I heard it correctly.

What's this?  (I googled and didn't find anything)

Has anyone here been on Come Dine With Me? How was it?


I also wonder what it must be like to watch yourself on the programme afterwards because it looks like they can edit people pretty harshly. Was that the case?

Who's a comedian, comic actor or tv personality Americans seem to find hilarious that you just don't get?


Partly inspired by how wildly popular James Corden seems to be in the US while reactions to him are much more mixed on this side of the pond.
